name: QB Sim
description:
Are you ready to experience the most realistic Quarterback Virtual Reality Simulator?

Designed for professional football teams we're pleased to have created a simulator that can be played by everyone. Design and create unlimited offensive or defensive plays and experience the nuances of quarterback play.

In practice mode create your own or copy your favorite NFL plays and see how the pros do it.Through QB Sim
  • Experience, learn and relive any play from the pocket
  • Recreate NFL or any game plays and see why a play worked or failed
  • Learn and understand the nuances of plays without a reliance on the whiteboard
  • Learn to read defenses through visualization
  • Create your own playbook and fast track learning
  • Speed up your quarterback's decision making processes
  • Correct mistakes through repetition
Features
  • Create any play in seconds within our playbook designer
  • Record any play and watch how you played it in replay
  • Watch replays in slo-mo or fast speeds and move to any location on the field to change the viewing angle
  • Alter arm style
  • Options to target or not target the QB by defensive players
  • Adjust the throw clock and recording of decision times for throws
  • Adjust the number of players on the field to simplify practice
  • Highlight best receiving option for easier tracking
  • Get down the field in game mode
NFL Game Statistics and Play Charts
  • Access 18 years of NFL game statistics for all of the teams
  • For the 2018 season, statistics for a game will be made available on the next day
  • View play by play data on each game with play chartsNot for Commercial UseThis version is for private and personal use only. For a commercial license please contact Mojo Soft
